Name: Meh-Groni
Ingredients: 60 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This Negroni-inspired cocktail will please mezcal loving bartenders and hardened drinkers (we also loved it) but may challenge other drinkers.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Jesse R. Raines at Vieux Carre, Washington DC, USA. Recipe courtesy of gazregan.com.
Nutrition: One serving of Meh-Groni contains 195 calories
